column4: why is thunderbird stuck at ersion 1.5 in breezy?  is it possible to update it somehow, or am i just screwed until i upgrade to dapper?
it's at 1.5 in breezy?  is there a backports version?
heh, well, I... thought, it was 1.0.X in breezy, (like firefox), you'd get 1.5 upgrading to dapper.
right, the security issues (if it's from the repository) have been rolled in
